meanings.sent1: The file was deletable with just one click.
meanings.sent2: The deletable text could easily be erased.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his memory was as deletable as a computer file.
meanings.sent4: The idea of starting fresh was as deletable as hitting the reset button.
meanings.sent5: The deletable mistake was quickly forgotten.

meanings.sent1: The stain on the shirt was deletable with the right detergent.
meanings.sent2: The deletable sticker peeled off easily.
meanings.sent3: He found joy in the deletable nature of temporary tattoos.
meanings.sent4: Her fear was as deletable as washing away chalk drawings in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The deletable smell vanished with a spray of air freshener.

meanings.sent1: The old furniture was deletable to make room for the new.
meanings.sent2: The deletable decorations were taken down after the party.
meanings.sent3: The deletable weeds in the garden were pulled out with ease.
meanings.sent4: His doubts were as deletable as erasing pencil marks.
meanings.sent5: The deletable clutter was cleared away to create space.
